abstract: Composer Lei Liang, whose latest work Lakescape V will be performed by Loadbang ensemble as part of Miller Theater’s Composer Portrait series, drew inspiration from paintings of Chinese artist Huang Binhong in his effort to create feeling of depth and space in music.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Liang, who has a coming Composer Portrait concert at the Miller Theater, transformed his composing process after research involving high-resolution scans of Chinese paintings.
snippet: Mr. Liang, who has a coming Composer Portrait concert at the Miller Theater, transformed his composing process after research involving high-resolution scans of Chinese paintings....

headline.main: For Composer Lei Liang, Technology Brings a Different Transcendence
headline.print_headline: A Composer Who Creates Landscapes for the Ears
